title: Lawnchair 12.1 Alpha adds Android 12’s At a Glance widget, more improvements
content:
Lawnchair 12.1 is now available in Alpha and includes a number of improvements alongside the new At a Glance widget found in Android 12.

more…

The post Lawnchair 12.1 Alpha adds Android 12’s At a Glance widget, more improvements appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Lawnchair 12.1 is now available in Alpha and includes a number of improvements alongside the new At a Glance widget found in Android 12. Announced via the official Telegram feed, Lawnchair 12.1 is the first build based on Launcher3 from Android 12.1 or 12L. This should mean that Lawnchair will operate more like the Pixel […]
